directions.dialogText: Did you notice the squirrel grab the tree in the last activity? Use \`move()\`, \`right()\` and \`getAcorn()\` to climb the tree and get the acorn on the branch!

levels.mission: Use \`move()\`, \`right()\` and \`getAcorn()\` to climb the tree and get the acorn on the branch.
levels.tools:
\`move()\`- move forward one square   \`left()\`- face left

\`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn \`right()\`- face right
levels.tips: First, type \`move();\` as many times as needed to get the squirrel next to the acorn. Then type \`right();\` to turn toward the acorn. Then use \`move();\` and \`getAcorn()\` to get the acorn.

directions.dialogText: Now use the new function \`up()\` along with \`move()\` and \`getAcorn\` to climb the side of the tree and get the acorn!

levels.mission: Use the \`up()\` function, along with the others you've learned, to get the squirrel up the tree to the acorn.
levels.tools:
\`up()\`- face up while on or next to tree \`left()\`- face left \`right()\`- face right 

\`move()\`- move forward one square \`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: After \`up();\`, type \`move();\` until the squirrel reaches the acorn. Then use \`getAcorn();\` to get the acorn.

directions.dialogText: There's just one more new function! Use \`down()\`, along with \`move()\` and \`getAcorn()\` to get the squirrel to the acorn below.

levels.mission: Use the \`down()\` function, along with the others you've learned, to get the squirrel down to the acorn below.
levels.tools:
\`up()\`- face up while on or next to tree \`left()\`- face left

\`down()\`- face down while on or next to tree  \`right()\`- face right 

\`move()\`- move forward one square \`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: First, type \`left();\` to change directions. Then use \`move();\` to get to the tree. Type \`down();\` to change directions, then use \`move();\` and \`getAcorn();\` to get the acorn.

quiz.text: If the squirrel was standing on a branch, facing right, which choice below would result in the squirrel facing left in the same square?

directions.dialogText: Let's make it a little harder! This time, use your functions to get TWO acorns.

levels.mission: By calling functions in the code panel above, direct the squirrel to gather both acorns.
levels.tools:
\`up()\`- face up while on or next to tree \`left()\`- face left

\`down()\`- face down while on or next to tree  \`right()\`- face right 

\`move()\`- move forward one square \`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: The squirrel can move up the middle of the tree or along either side, but it can only move on top of branches.

directions.dialogText: Last level! Use the functions you've learned to get both acorns!

levels.mission: Use the functions you've learned (\`right()\`, \`left()\`, \`up()\`, \`down()\`, \`move()\`, \`getAcorn()\`) to get both acorns.
levels.tools:
\`up()\`- face up while on or next to tree \`left()\`- face left

\`down()\`- face down while on or next to tree  \`right()\`- face right 

\`move()\`- move forward one square \`getAcorn()\`- pick up acorn
levels.tips: Use the step button above to run one line of code at a time. Each time your write a line, run that line, then add another, test it, and so on.
